sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The perfect politician, or, A full view of the life and action (military and civil) of O. Cromwel whereunto is added his character, and a compleat catalogue of all the honours conferr'd by him on several persons. Fletcher, Henry. Raybould, William.
[6], 459 [i.e. 359] p. : port.
Printed by J. Cottrel, for William Roybould ... and Henry Fletcher ..., London : 1660.
Ascribed to Henry Fletcher. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); Stonehill; Wing. Also attributed to William Raybould. Cf. Abbot, W.C. bibliography of Oliver Cromwell, 1929. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
=======

Printed by J. Cottrel, for William Roybould ... and Henry Fletcher ..., London : 1660.
Ascribed to Henry Fletcher. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); Stonehill; Wing. Also attributed to William Raybould. Cf. Abbot, W.C. bibliography of Oliver Cromwell, 1929. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
